name: 飞机大战坦克
description:
"Airplane vs. Tank" is a tank game where players need to control a tank to fight against other tanks and planes. When the health value drops to 0, the game ends, and the number of kills in the field will be counted and accumulated. Come and challenge your highest kill count!

Features

  • The tank turret can rotate freely to achieve a 360-degree attack without dead ends.
  • The game map is a fresh style with beautiful music, which is very suitable for leisure and relaxation.
  • The enemy is divided into two types, red tanks and drones. For the convenience of hitting, the drones cannot move.
  • Every time you kill an enemy, you can accumulate the number of kills, and you can challenge your highest number of kills!
